Initializer# init(unicodeScalarLiteral:)

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
init(unicodeScalarLiteral value: Self.ExtendedGraphemeClusterLiteralType)
```

Available when `ExtendedGraphemeClusterLiteralType` is `Self.UnicodeScalarLiteralType`.## [See Also](/documentation/Swift/Character/init(unicodeScalarLiteral:)#see-also)

### [Infrequently Used Functionality](/documentation/Swift/Character/init(unicodeScalarLiteral:)#Infrequently-Used-Functionality)

[`init(extendedGraphemeClusterLiteral: Character)`](/documentation/swift/character/init(extendedgraphemeclusterliteral:))Creates a character with the specified value.
